mapper.select: select user_id as userId, user_name as userName, email, phone_number as phoneNumber, nickname, role from users order by user_id desc
select post_id as postId, title, content_date as contentDate from post where user_id = #{user_id} order by post_id desc

select c.comment_id as commentId, c.post_id as postId, c.user_id as userId, c.content as content, c.content_date as contentDate, p.title as postTitle from comments c join post p on c.post_id = p.post_id where c.user_id = #{userId} order by c.comment_id
